text: Can you explain a bit more about the reasoning behind checking to see if the file exists?
Interesting question. I’m as a newbie to hs templating would like to hear the answer as well :slightly_smiling_face:

Does anyone know how to add icons for custom modules?
While submitting my template, I’m getting this notification.
Thanks :pray:

usually I add icons to custom email modules: under Marketing > Files and Templates > Design tools > find the module in the files tree at the left sidebar > click on it

at the right sidebar you’ll see module icon and label. click on the icon and update it
I guess it has to be the same way for other module types

Ivanna is correct (thank you for answering that)
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/modules/configuration#adding-an-icon|Adding a module Icon - using design manager or CLI>
<@U014DU2CFBQ> Thank you a lot! It worked :slightly_smiling_face:
